alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 8:44AM CDT until April 17 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LEAKE AND NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 843 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dowdville, or near Edinburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Philadelphia around 850 AM CDT. Dixon around 855 AM CDT. Neshoba around 905 AM CDT. Bethsaida around 910 AM CDT. House around 915 AM CDT. Herbert Springs around 920 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tucker and Standing Pine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
